sqlMap.sql: /* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.C_PARENTID , A.C_POSITION , A.C_LEFT , A.C_RIGHT , A.C_LEVEL , A.C_TITLE , A.C_TYPE /* user filed add point*/ , A.C_PASSWORD AS password , A.C_EMAIL AS email , A.C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , A.C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , A.C_LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_TYPE = #c_type# , C_TITLE = #c_title# , C_PASSWORD = #password# , C_EMAIL = #email# , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT = #loginFailureCnt# , C_JOIN_DT = #joinDt# , C_LAST_LOGIN_DT = #lastLoginDt# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_PASSWORD AS password , C_EMAIL AS email , C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT AS loginFailureCnt , C_JOIN_DT AS joinDt , C_LAST_LOGIN_DT AS lastLoginDt FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
sqlMap.insert:
/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_USER_INFO ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL, C_TITLE, C_PASSWORD, C_EMAIL, C_LOGIN_FAILURE_CNT, C_JOIN_DT, C_LAST_LOGIN_DT ) VALUES ( S_USER_INFO.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level#, #c_title#, #password#, #email#, #loginFailureCnt#, #joinDt#, #lastLoginDt#)
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_USER_INFO.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(C_ID) FROM T_USER_INFO WHERE C_TITLE = #title#
